metadata.title: CVE-2020-35450 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Gobby 0.4.11 allows a NULL pointer dereference in the D-Bus handler for certain set_language calls.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-35450` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gobby - 0.6.0~20201227~b98f4d2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gobby package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0~20201227~b98f4d2-1').
